title: Washing machine [caveman]
brief_description: A hand-drawn 2D computer animation in response to the theme washing machine. A caveman’s chase of a dinosaur is interrupted by his curiosity for a mysterious object in the landscape, a washing machine. He fiddles with and bashes the washing machine in an attempt to work out what it is and discovers its’ function, a ‘drinking fountain’ (pre-historic term unknown).
